comment.author: Bradley
comment.text: The President and the Vice President are not going to agree on everything. And that's what makes a great partnership. Balancing eachother out. Democrats are going to see it as a way to make it seem that Trump and Pence "are not on the same page", but to Make America Great Again we need both of them to work well together. That they will do!!

replies.author: Skylar
replies.text: and God forbid if they did-- we would be on the road to a dictatorship

replies.author: Scott
replies.text: MAKE AMERICA GROPE AGAINN ... SNIFFF .... SNIFFF
